am_devices_mspi_psram_aps25616ba_1p2v.c File Reference

Multi-bit SPI PSRAM driver for the APS25616BA 1.2V device. More...

Detailed Description

Multi-bit SPI PSRAM driver for the APS25616BA 1.2V device.

#include <string.h>
#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"
#include "am_devices_mspi_psram_aps25616ba_1p2v.h"
#include "am_bsp.h"
#include "am_util.h"
